column13: Divin Vigneron Pinot Noir is an elegant alcohol-free red wine from Touraine, in the heart of France’s Loire Valley. The grapes are cultivated in Divin’s own vineyards, where the team oversees every step from vine to cellar to ensure exceptional quality. Part of the wine matures in French oak barrels, while the rest is aged in stainless steel to preserve its fruit purity. Using low-temperature vacuum distillation, the alcohol is gently removed while maintaining the original aroma profile. The result is a refined Pinot Noir with notes of cherry, strawberry, balsamic and a subtle oak touch — dry, balanced and full of finesse.

Meet the DIVIN cuvée Sauvignon Blanc ‘Vigneron’ with 0.5% alcohol, a gourmet creation based on our best vineyard plots in Touraine. The unique production process is based on an avant-garde technique to reintegrate the aromas at the end of the alcohol-free process, giving this wine a distinctive personality.
Produced in the Loire Valley, this non-alcoholic wine comes from our parcels with old vines. It is the result of an assemblage of one part aged in stainless steel vats to preserve freshness and fruit, with another part aged in barrels for 10 months. 
Divin Vigneron Sauvignon Blanc offers a harmonious tasting with pronounced aromas of white fruit, pear, blackcurrant, cherry blossom, wild nettle, vanilla, fresh wood and coffee nuances. On the palate, this dry white wine is elegant and fresh, withwoody aromas that harmonise to create a fine fullness. A delicate experience that subtly combines the freshness of the fruit with the complexity of the woody notes.
With its rich aromatic palette, Divin Vigneron Sauvignon Blanc pairs perfectly with fresh, light dishes.

The noble chenin blanc grape is considered the ambassador of the Loire. The grapes come from its own vineyards in Touraine and are cultivated specifically to make non-alcoholic wine.
The young chenin blanc wine matures on the lie and a very small proportion in wood to create the ideal base wine to get the best result after dealcoholisation. The wine is de-alcoholised by vacuum distillation at low temperature, this way the aromas remain intact and you keep the typical fresh character of chenin blanc. This chenin blanc offers delicate and seductive aromas of stone fruit, pear and ripe apple and might remind you of a freshly baked tarte tatin. The wine is juicy and soft and you also taste some caramelised notes. The wine is harmonious and perfectly balanced!
Divin Chenin Blanc 0.0% is served as an aperitif or with dinner. This non-alcoholic wine goes well with fresh salads with goat's cheese, honey and walnut and with (starter) dishes with fish or shellfish. Serve well chilled!

The Vita libera Primitive is a delicious alcohol-free red wine made from 100% Primitivo grapes. With its beautiful ruby red color and pronounced fruity aromas of red fruit, such as berries, this non-alcoholic wine is beautifully balanced with a persistent aftertaste.

This alcohol-free Somée Rivaner stands out for its exceptionally dry quality. A refreshing bouquet of gooseberries and grapefruit unfolds in the nose. This non-alcoholic Rivaner wine is relatively mild due to its low acidity, yet it remains fruity and delights the palate with a subtle bouquet reminiscent of muscat. It particularly shines when paired with hearty bread snacks or dishes based on tomatoes, showcasing its aromatic strengths.

The Darling Cellars de-alcoholised white wine is pale yellow with a green hue, has aromas of ripe tropical fruit, yellow peaches and gooseberries with a fresh acidity and a lingering finish. This sauvignon blanc goes well with most seafood and is especially delicious with fresh mussels or oysters! This non-alcoholic wine is low in calories as well as vegan.

Canter Rosso is a harmonious wine, ruby red in colour with orange highlights. It is a wine whose persistence is generally very good. Canter Rosso has hints of red fruits such as black cherries, plums and blueberries. This non-alcoholic red wine tastes great with cheese and meat and can also be used for cooking.

With its pleasant freshness and smoothness, this is a versatile non-alcoholic white wine for the whole meal. It goes well with a wide variety of dishes, from starters to fish or white meat. An elegant and sophisticated wine, straw yellow in colour with golden reflections that carries musk, freshly cut grass and spring fruits. Serve this non-alcoholic wine chilled at a temperature of 10-12°.

The alcohol-free Pierre Zéro Signature Grenache is a combination of delicacy, purity and elegance and contains no added sugars, preservatives, flavourings or sulphites. Flavours of black cherries, sweet herbs with hints of chocolate give this non-alcoholic Grenache a unique and qualitative character. This delicious non-alcoholic red wine goes perfectly with game and pasta dishes.

With the Kolonne Null Riesling, you have a first-class alcohol-free white wine in your glass with a wonderfully brilliant, light-yellow colour. The first notes of the non-alcoholic Riesling reveal nuances of fragrant roses, lilacs and jasmine. The fruity elements of the bouquet are complemented by aromas of forest floor.
This alcohol-free Riesling from Kolonne Null is perfect for all wine lovers who want as little residual sugar as possible in their wine. This light-hearted white wine is characterised by a wonderfully crisp texture.
This wine is best drunk at a temperature of 5 - 7°C. Perfect with roasted vegetables with fish, salmon and fennel omelette or a green salad with beetroot.

This expressive non-alcoholic red wine comes from Spain and offers pronounced aromas of plums, cherries, blackberries and blackcurrants, rounded off with vanilla, gingerbread and cocoa beans. Thanks to its powerful fruit tones, the Cuvée Rouge N°02 is wonderfully fresh and lively in taste and has a surprising finish with soft tannins.
Drink this spirited, alcohol-free red wine preferably at a temperature of 15 - 18°C. Delicious in combination with grilled meat or pasta dishes!

This non-alcoholic Glühwein with the traditional taste of herbs, anise, cinnamon and cardamom is sweet and fruity. This non-alcoholic Glühwein serves you warmly. Enjoy this Glühwein on cold days and also for children it is a delicious non-alcoholic drink.

This non-alcoholic dry wine consists mainly of Cabernet Sauvignon grapes of good structure and purity what is typical of this grape variety from France. This wine has a strong red colour, a fruity aroma and is rich in minerals and tannins. This red wine is delicious to combine with meat dishes.

The Michel Schneider collection stands for wines of distinctive character. The aromas of this Chardonnay were withdrawn gently and applied again after de-alcoholization. Enjoy this tasteful, non-alcoholic alternative which is delicious to combine with seafood and poultry.

A light, smooth Merlot alcoholic wine made from the Merlot grape from southern France with a typical Merlot bouquet with moderate tannins and a spicy flavor. This red wine is delicious combined with wild meat dishes.

Airen white wine is made from Airen grapes. The wine is filtered in a special way so there are no remaining traces of alcohol in the bottle and therefore also Halal certified. This white wine has a straw yellow color and a fresh aroma of apple and citrus. This 0.0% non-alcoholic halal white wine is delicious combined with fish dishes.

This delicious shiraz Rosé wine with notes of red fruit and berries such as blackberries and currants, has a refreshing character. The fine, fruity taste is balanced by the invigorating acidity and pleasant sweetness. The typical taste has been preserved through the gentle de-alcoholization of the wine.

The Dropstop prevents the leakage of (sparkling) wine. But this Dropstop does not only fit wine bottles. The Dropstop is also a good solution against leaks for distilled drinks, for example. Roll up the round Dropstop into a cylinder shape and put it in the bottle neck. This creates a perfect pouring spout which prevents dripping. The dropstop is packed per 5 pieces and reusable. Clean it under the tap and it is ready for the next use!

Canter Rosé is a bright pink, fresh and light non-alcoholic rosé. It has notes of fresh spring fruits (strawberries, cherries, pomegranate) and more pronounced floral notes (rose, cyclamen). Serve this non-alcoholic rosé preferably chilled at a temperature of 10-12°.

Wednesday’s Domaine Elan is a fresh and elegant alcohol-free rosé with 0.0% alcohol, originating from the historic wine region of La Mancha in central Spain. Crafted from carefully selected Airén and Tempranillo grapes, the alcohol is gently removed before enriching the wine with natural ingredients that enhance its body, aroma, and length. In the glass, it displays a delicate salmon-pink hue with a lively, fine mousse. The aroma opens with summery fruit notes of strawberry, raspberry, and citrus, complemented by a subtle minerality. On the palate, it is dry, well-balanced, and wonderfully refreshing — a stylish, sophisticated choice for long spring and summer days.

This alcohol-free red wine made from the Zinfandel grape is deep dark red in colour with the scent of black fruit and some vanilla. The taste is sultry, round and smooth with fruit influences such as those of blackberries and strawberry. The wine has a firm structure with soft tannins and a pleasant spiciness in the background. A fine wine to enjoy at the table.

Canter Il Rosso Perfetto is a harmonious wine with a ruby red colour, good transparency and violet to garnet reflections. The wine has fruity notes of red and black berries and floral notes of violets. Among the fruits, black cherries, plums, blueberries and blackberries can be recognised. This non-alcoholic red wine goes well with cold cuts and cheeses, as well as meat with an intense flavour.

Discover the irresistible Vinada Tempting Tempranillo Rosé, a premium alcohol-free rosé crafted from sun-ripened Spanish Tempranillo grapes. This stylish rosé delivers everything you love about a classic rosé—fresh, refined, and beautifully balanced—but completely alcohol-free.
Experience vibrant aromas of strawberry, raspberry, and a delicate touch of rose. The taste is lightly fruity, soft, and harmonious, with a summery freshness that transforms any moment into something special.
Perfect for those who want to enjoy a high-quality alcohol-free rosé without compromising on flavour, elegance, or lifestyle. VINADA Tempting Tempranillo Rosé: 0% alcohol, 100% sophistication.

The Torres Natureo Syrah Cabernet Sauvignon rosé has an intense, shiny cherry to raspberry red color. In the nose a fruity bouquet of wild berries and sweet red fruits with a hint of cinnamon. Vividly fresh and fruity taste of red berries with a long finish.

This alcohol-free semi-dry white Riesling wine from Somée is made from the best and most famous grape of Germany, the Riesling grape. This wine has an elegant, strong and full flavour and is excellent to combine with seafood and spicy dishes.

Riesling Grünlack XO is the world’s first alcohol-free Ultra-Premium wine, created in collaboration with Schloss Johannisberg. This exceptional cuvée blends rare reserve wines from the 1960s and ’70s with selected modern vintages.
The bouquet reveals ripe apricot, candied citrus and refined mineral notes. On the palate, it offers a perfect balance of subtle sweetness, freshness and ripe fruit—a complex, alcohol-free interpretation of Rheingau Riesling Spätlese.
Awarded 93 points by James Suckling, and named “Best Alcohol-Free Wine of the Year 2025” by VINUM, the wine has earned recognition from leading international critics and one of the most influential German wine publications.
Each bottle comes in a luxurious wooden case.
